item.description: Let's meet up for Happy Hour every 1st Friday of the Month. I'll update each one as it gets closer with a place and a host. Stop by, for a few minutes, or all night. Its a great time to come meet new folks.
item.why: Sadly, Twitters closed down. :( So let's go to everyone's favorite place - Venetian Moon in Reading. I'll get there very early to grab the back room downstairs for us as usual! Stop by anytime throughout the evening!
item.name: Happy Hour - First Friday - note change to Venetian Moon
